```{r}
ls_youtoo <- c("You_Too_01", "You_Too_02")

file_ls_youtoo
```

```{r}
x0 = 8
list <- seq(x0, 9.5, 0.06)

tidy_brain_ls_wt <- brain_ls_wt[[1]]%>%
  tidy(threshold = list[1])


for i in (1:length(list)){
  tidy_brain_ls_wt <- brain_ls_wt%>%
  tidy(threshold = list[i])
  model <- lm(y ~ I(x^2) + x, data = tidy_brain_ls_wt[[1]])

  broom::augment()
summary(model)$r.squared
```
